Nathan Cluff

Full Stack Developer

About Me

Growing up, I have always had a passion for data, numbers, technology, and beingcreative. That led to a deep interest in either Architecture or Software Engineering. Keeping this on topic, this led me to ask my cousin with a degree in computer science how I should start. I was introduced to web development. For me, that, and my aforementioned passions, naturally led me to full stack development.

Beyond programming, my passions are in sports, graphic design, camping, and just building memories with my wife and children. If you want to work with me, or just be friends, feel free to reach out!
